name: Blink-Led from Web Interface
tagline: Johnny Five Demo Using Simple UI
body:
# Blink LED from Web Interface

Blink an LED in Arudino through a Web Interface.

![Blink-LED By Thiru](http://i.imgur.com/wBK9K8k.gif)

## Overview
This is a simple demo page uses jQuery, CSS for Showing the LED on Browser screen. Arduino Uno is used for LED.

## How To Install

Check out the project. 

## How To Play

Open the blink.html

Click on the Bulb in  your screen. This triggers a toggle action through port 8080 at Arduino LED.

### Arduino - Johnny Five Implementation


````
node 01-blink-blink.js
````

This runs an express js server at node and listens to the port 8080. Whenever toggle action is triggered at this port LED's state is changed to ON/OFF.

I've used the **Hello World ** from [johnny-five](Credit http://johnny-five.io/examples/)

![Johnny Five ](http://johnny-five.io/img/breadboard/led-13.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
